囐字的基本解释

囐
yàn
古同“唁”，吊唁。

囐
zá
〔嘈囐〕古同“嘈杂”，（声音）杂乱而喧闹。

囐
niè
论罪。

囐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zá］
［《廣韻》才割切，入曷，從。］
同“囋2”。
[②]［yàn］
［《集韻》牛堰切，去願，疑。］
(1)同“唁”。吊唁。
(2)见“囐2噠”。

囐字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　囐； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页215第25
【廣韻】才割切【集韻】才達切，?音?。【玉篇】本作?。【廣韻】本作囋。詳前?囋二字註。【張衡·東京賦】奏嚴鼓之嘈囐。　又【北周書·異域傳】囐噠國，在于闐西。　又【集韻】牙葛切，音嶭。（【玉篇】本作?。詳前?字註。）　又【集韻】魚列切，音孽。本作?。議罪也。同讞?。　又【玉篇】古文唁字。註詳七畫。

囐字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
囐字的起名意思

暂无。

囐
Basic explanation of words
囐
yàn
Gu Tong "consolation", condolences.
囐
zá
〔Noisy〕 Gu Tong is "noisy", (sound) is messy and noisy.
囐
niè
On sin.
囐
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zá］
["Guangyun" only cut and cut, enter and follow. ]
Same as "囋2".
[②]［yàn］
["Ji Yun" Niuyan cuts, go to wish, doubt. ]
(1) Same as "consolation". Condolences.
(2) See "囐2大".
囐
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　囐; Kangxi strokes: 23; page number: page 215 to 25
[Guang Yun] Only cut and cut [Ji Yun] Only reach cut, "yin?". [Jade articles] This work?. [Guang Yun] This is a 囋. Before detailed? 囋 two word note. [Zhang Heng·Tokyo Fu] Playing the stern drum.　[Beijing Zhou Shu · Biography of Foreign Lands] The country of Kanda is in the west of Yutian.　[Jiyun] Yage cut, sound. ([Jade Chapter] This work?. Before the details? Note.) 　 [Jiyun] fish row cut, sound evil. This work?. Controversy also. The same?.　[Jade articles] Ancient Chinese characters of condolences. Note the seven paintings in detail.
